CN-HB-02 |blank_name = Licence plate prefixes |blank_info = |website = (in Simplified Chinese) |footnotes = }} Huangshi (), alternatively romanized as Hwangshih, is a prefecture-level city in southeastern Hubei province, People's Republic of China. Its population was 2,429,318 people at the 2010 census. ==References== Category:Cities in China Category:Hubei
